advantages.advantagesAfterText: We bring together excitement, service and comfort in one seamless experience. It’s easy for first‑timers to settle in, and rewarding for seasoned players to return. Every visit delivers strong entertainment, great atmosphere and memorable moments.

history.title: About Genting Casino Salford
history.description1: We stand out by blending gaming, bar culture and nightlife energy in one destination. We focus on making wins, atmosphere and service feel premium from the moment you arrive.
history.description2: Our casino is where excitement and style come together for a complete night out. We welcome guests with a confident, friendly service. It’s effortless to move from a drink at the bar to your favourite game at the tables.
history.description3: We keep the pace lively with a mix of classic play and modern electronic options. It’s equally enjoyable with friends or on your own. We prioritise comfort, so everything feels easy to navigate. The gaming floor carries that true casino buzz. We turn even an ordinary evening into something that feels like an occasion. Reward perks and member privileges add extra value to every visit. Each time you join us, you leave with memorable moments and the urge to return.

customHtml.title: A Night That Starts With Us
customHtml.description:
We create a confident, modern casino atmosphere where lighting, sound and floor energy set the pace instantly. The space is designed for freedom of choice—play, socialise, watch sport or simply soak up the vibe. We make it comfortable for guests who come for the thrill and for those who prefer focused, composed play. We value the details, so the feeling of style carries through every moment.


We’re open daily from 12:00 to 05:00, giving you the flexibility to visit when it suits you. If you’re here for live tables, you’ll feel the distinctive momentum as the afternoon turns into a full evening experience. The late‑night format means you never have to rush your time with us. It’s easy to start with relaxed downtime and shift into gaming when the mood hits.


Our Late Bar is where the night shines—cocktails, classic pours and a true big‑night atmosphere. The bar is open daily from 12:00 to 01:00, so you can begin with an aperitif or pause between sessions in style. We build a friendly setting that works for meeting friends, celebrating something special or unwinding after a busy day. Drinks, vibe and service come together to keep the night smooth and memorable.


If you enjoy a fuller experience, we always have more to pair with gaming: major live sport broadcasts, themed nights and fresh reasons to return. We keep a lively, club‑like energy that makes you want to stay longer. Nearby accommodation options are easy to access, making it simple to plan an overnight stay close by. This is the kind of venue that fits both spontaneous visits and carefully planned nights out.


We reward regular guests with a strong set of perks and bonus opportunities. Our loyalty programme adds value through privileges, extra rewards and tailored offers. We also run monthly promotions so every visit feels richer and more exciting. From first impression to the final highlight, the night is crafted to feel complete.


Service and Payments — Clear, Simple, Comfortable

Our team delivers confident professionalism with genuine attention to every guest. We help first‑timers settle in, explain rules clearly and make the experience feel relaxed from the start. For experienced players, we keep service quick, accurate and smooth—right through from seating to settling results. Communication stays polite and precise, with a warm tone that keeps the night easy.


English is our main language, and we’re used to welcoming guests from many different backgrounds. If you want clarity around game terms or table rules, we explain everything in a straightforward, respectful way. We focus on clear guidance and fast solutions, so you spend more time enjoying the moment. On the floor, it’s easy to ask about games, stakes and table formats without breaking your rhythm.


Transactions are handled in pounds sterling. For guest convenience, we support widely used payment options suited to top‑ups and on‑site spending. Bank cards from major networks are typically accepted, along with cash for eligible operations under venue rules. We keep the process transparent, so you understand what happens before anything is processed.


For quick access to cash, ATMs are available close by within the surrounding area, and currency exchange can be arranged through familiar nearby services when needed. We help you navigate the best way to manage your spend—where to withdraw, how to top up smoothly, and what suits your visit style. If you prefer cashless, we support it with speed and ease. A key principle for us is payment security and careful handling of every transaction.


Cashing out winnings is designed to feel calm and straightforward. You receive settlement in a clear format, and we guide you towards the most convenient method—cash or other available payment routes. Standard identity checks and security procedures help protect your funds and keep everything accurate. In most cases, player winnings are not taxed, and if anything depends on personal circumstances, it’s best handled in line with individual obligations and official rules.


Visiting Rules — Simple, Clear, Comfortable

We follow a smart casual standard to keep the atmosphere stylish and enjoyable for everyone. Entry is for adult guests, and we may ask for valid photo ID to confirm age. We expect respectful behaviour and a friendly tone across the venue. Aggressive conduct and anything that affects safety or comfort is not permitted. Responsible play and self‑control are part of our culture. We maintain a neat, well‑presented environment so the night feels premium. For security, standard monitoring and access control apply in certain areas. We ask guests to avoid face‑covering items and to keep headwear off on the gaming floor. At tables, seating is reserved for active players. We’re always happy to explain entry procedures and help you move through any registration smoothly. Getting here is easy by car, taxi or public transport. Parking solutions are in place to make your visit convenient.


Key rules

  • • Dress code: smart casual, neat appearance, closed footwear; sportswear and football shirts are not encouraged.
  • • Age: 18+ only, ID checks may apply.
  • • Behaviour: respect guests and staff, keep it calm and friendly.
  • • Prohibited actions: no illegal activity, no interference with games, no safety breaches.
  • • Photos and filming: restrictions may apply in certain areas for guest privacy.
  • • Table seating: seats are for players; watching is welcome without disrupting play.
  • • Parking: convenient parking options are available nearby.
  • • Getting here: easy access by car, taxi, and public transport routes.

Our Loyalty Programme — More Value Every Time You Visit

We reward guests who choose us again and again, turning regular visits into tangible benefits. Our loyalty programme is built to keep rewards clear and progress genuinely satisfying. The more you play and spend time with us, the more opportunities unlock—from tailored offers to upgraded privileges and exclusive perks. We focus on convenience, so registration takes very little time and rewards become easy to access. It’s not only about stakes; it’s also about overall engagement—visits, activities, special challenges and casino events. We refresh promotions regularly so you always have a reason to return. Members enjoy smoother access to bar perks and seasonal offers. We create a club‑style feeling where every tier brings real value. Your rewards build up naturally, helping every night feel richer with minimal effort. Most importantly, you feel that your loyalty is genuinely appreciated.


Registration requirements

  • • Age 18+: ID confirmation may be required.
  • • Member profile: basic details to track points and offers.
  • • Card/app access: convenient tracking and promotions on the go.
  • • Preferences: you choose how you receive updates and offers.

Tiers and how to earn them

  • • Start: register and visit—unlock entry‑level perks and offers.
  • • Silver: consistent visits and steady activity—more personalised bonuses.
  • • Gold: strong engagement—priority offers and boosted rewards.
  • • Platinum: top‑level activity—status perks and best tailored conditions.

Bonuses and perks

  • • 10% off drinks: enjoy extra value at the bar during your night.
  • • Double points periods: faster tier progress and quicker access to rewards.
  • • Personalised offers: aligned with your favourite games and visit style.
  • • Challenge rewards: perks for visits, play activity and event participation.
  • • Birthday treats: extra benefits to elevate your celebration.
  • • Special invitations: member‑only promotions and curated events.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Genting Casino Salford
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers — More Excitement in Play and Leisure

We regularly enhance the gaming experience with extra benefits so every session feels more exciting and more rewarding. Our offers aren’t limited to games—bar energy, live sport and themed nights amplify the overall vibe. We run short promotional windows where you get more value from the same activity. On selected dates, we lean into a jackpot mood, making it especially fun to explore new slots or return to favourites. For live‑table fans, we create reasons to stay longer with surprise perks that fit naturally into the night. We support seasonal moments so holidays, major sporting fixtures and key weeks feel bigger and brighter with us. Our approach stays simple: conditions are clear, participation is easy, and the benefit feels immediate. We also introduce entertainment‑style packages that blend gaming, drinks and nightlife into one smooth experience. For groups, we shape offers that make celebrations feel effortless. Most importantly, there’s always something current to come back for, because our event calendar stays active and fresh.


Bonuses and offers

  • • Slot jackpots up to £20,000: big‑win potential on selected machines.
  • • “Double Points” promo periods: faster progress and quicker rewards.
  • • 10% off drinks: added value when you unwind at the bar.
  • • Tournament nights (e.g., buy‑in from £20): competitive play with prize appeal.
  • • Seasonal campaigns (e.g., 3–7 bonus days): limited‑time boosts with stronger value.
  • • Group packages (e.g., from £50 per guest): an easy way to combine play and leisure.
  • • Late‑night events (e.g., 2–4 hours): music‑led nights with strong atmosphere.
  • • Sport nights: top matches on screen with a lively viewing vibe.

Popular Games — Classic Play and Modern Formats Under One Roof

We’ve shaped our game selection so every guest can find their perfect pace—from strategic control to pure momentum. Our live tables deliver that authentic casino feeling with real dealers, smooth dealing rhythm and buzzing energy around you. If speed is your preference, our electronic formats keep play fast, comfortable and easy to follow. We support games that are simple for newcomers yet satisfying for experienced players to master. Blackjack suits those who love discipline and decision‑making, while roulette brings movement, anticipation and excitement. For guests chasing big moments, slots add variety, features and a jackpot‑style thrill. We also offer quick‑rule games that work brilliantly for groups and relaxed nights. Switching formats is effortless: tables, machines and electronic stations are all part of one seamless experience. We keep the night flowing—from your first wager to your final highlight. And the atmosphere makes every game feel like part of a bigger occasion.


Games

  • • Roulette: classic pace, intuition and smart staking options.
  • • Blackjack: control, maths and strong decision‑making.
  • • Three Card Poker: fast hands and upbeat energy.
  • • Slots: variety, feature rounds and jackpot potential.
  • • Electronic Roulette: comfortable staking with quick, smooth rounds.
  • • Live E‑tables: a blend of live feel and modern speed.

Betting at Our Casino — Minimum and Maximum Guides

We offer flexible stake limits so you can play in the style that suits you—whether you prefer a careful start or confident higher‑stake action. Our ranges are designed to let you control the pace of your night and your risk level while keeping the experience premium. Live tables bring classic energy and dealer service, while electronic formats add speed and convenience. Below are practical guide ranges to help you plan your bankroll and pick the games you enjoy most.


Game Type Min Bet Max Bet
American Roulette £1 £200
Blackjack £2 £1,000
Three Card Poker £2 £100
Electronic Roulette £0.10 £100
Slots £0.20 £5
Live E‑tables £0.10 £100

Entertainment and Shows — A Night That Hits Different

We don’t just create a gaming floor—we deliver a complete night with energy, music and standout moments. It’s easy to begin with play, shift into the bar scene, and continue the night in full entertainment mode without changing venues. Regular evening formats keep a strong nightlife feel: the right lighting, upbeat sound and an atmosphere you want to be part of. We put special focus on recurring entertainment so you know there’s always something to catch, any day you visit.


Our late‑night vibe builds as the venue comes alive—more buzz, more momentum, and a stronger sense of occasion. We support major live sport broadcasts so you can watch the biggest fixtures in great company with smooth service. On selected dates, we run themed nights that turn your visit into a true event—music‑led energy and that celebratory feel. Everything is designed to complement the gaming experience, not distract from it.


For guests who enjoy competitive excitement, we support skill‑driven formats and special gaming moments that add extra edge to the night. For groups, we create the ideal night‑out rhythm: start with play, move into drinks, and finish on a high with an entertainment highlight. That flow makes the experience feel complete and memorable. You don’t get scattered options—you get a curated night.


All entertainment

  • • Live Sports: major fixtures on screens with a shared viewing buzz.
  • • Themed nights: music and mood that make the night feel special.
  • • Gaming events: competitive formats and special reasons to play.
  • • Seasonal weeks: calendar highlights with a bigger celebration feel.
  • • Bar‑led nightlife: cocktail culture and strong late‑night vibe.

Bars, Leisure and Night‑Out Comfort — Built for Your Perfect Visit

We design leisure to feel as exciting as the gaming itself. Our Late Bar is a true focal point where cocktails, classic pours and a late‑night atmosphere come together as one smooth vibe. It’s the perfect place to start your evening, take a stylish break between sessions, or finish the night with a final highlight. We keep service friendly and confident, so you can relax comfortably with friends or unwind solo.


Your food and drink moments are built for ease, keeping you in rhythm when you want a bite or another drink. The bar atmosphere keeps the sense of occasion alive, even if you only planned a short visit. We focus on a cohesive feel—music, lighting and mood support a premium night‑out style. That way, downtime becomes part of the overall experience, not a separate detour.


If you’re planning a longer stay, nearby hotel options make it easy to extend the night without rushing. The surrounding area offers plenty of convenient accommodation, letting your visit turn into a full overnight experience. We work brilliantly for quick stops and for bigger nights with a complete plan. The result is a night that feels thoughtfully put together from start to finish.


All leisure spots

  • • The Late Bar: cocktails, drinks and a strong late‑night atmosphere.
  • • Lounge areas: comfortable spots to pause and reset between sessions.
  • • Nearby hotels: convenient accommodation options close by for extended stays.

items.title: Can I pay without using cash?
items.answer: Yes—we support convenient cashless payment options to keep your night effortless.

items.title: Can I take a break and set limits for myself?
items.answer: Yes—we support responsible play and can guide you to self‑control tools.

items.title: How quickly can I settle winnings?
items.answer: We aim for fast, transparent settlement while following standard security checks.
